report.title: Species and occurrence counts by warehouse user sites
report.description: Lists locations and the number of species and occurrences within them for the sites owned by a warehouse user. Relies on the spatial index builder to cache the link between sites and records.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms lt on lt.id=l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN ( index_locations_samples ils JOIN cache_occurrences_functional co on co.sample_id=ils.sample_id ) on ils.location_id=l.id #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.created_by_id=#user_id# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR co.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR co.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(co.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (CAST(l.location_type_id AS character varying)='#location_type_id#' OR '#location_type_id#'='' OR lt.term='#location_type_id#')

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
